entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
